QueryViewSpec.Name: Child Interactions Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to allow searching for various Child Interactions used for Global Changes.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select distinct dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDLOOKUPID (soc.ID, 1) as CHILDLOOKUPID , dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION.LOOKUPID as LOCATIONLOOKUPID , uce.CURRENTPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE , (select dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE where ID = uce.CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID) as CHILDLIVESWITHDESCRIPTION , (select dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE where ID = uce.FATHERWORKSASCODEID) as FATHERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , uce.FATHERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE where ID = uce.MOTHERWORKSASCODEID) as MOTHERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , uce.MOTHERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE where ID = uce.CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID) as CAREGIVERRELATIONDESCRIPTION , uce.CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE where ID = uce.CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID) as CAREGIVERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , uce.CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE where ID = uce.CAREGIVERREASONCODEID) as CAREGIVERREASONDESCRIPTION , uce.REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER , uce.NUMBEROFSISTERS , uce.NUMBEROFBROTHERS , uce.TERMINATEHOLDSTARTDATE , uce.DEPARTUREFORMRECEIVED , uce.CCHVALIDATED , uce.REGISTRATIONDATE , uce.BATCHNUMBER , uce.FUNDED , uce.PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION , (select dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE where ID = uce.CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID) as CHILDPROFILEUPDATEDESCRIPTION , (select dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE where ID = uce.CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID) as CHILDPROFILESTATUSDESCRIPTION , uce.PHOTOSTORED , uce.CURRENTPHOTODATE , uce.CCHTEMPID , uce.CCHENTEREDBY , uce.ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION , uce.CLASSLEVEL , uce.ATTENDINGSCHOOL , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.NODEPARTUREFORM , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.RECEIVEDFAREWELLLETTER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEFORMCOMPLETED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.FORMCOMPLETEDBY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEOFDEPARTURE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEPROCESSED , (select dbo.USR_DEPARTURE_ADMINISTRATIVE_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_DEPARTURE_ADMINISTRATIVE_CODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ADMINISTRATIVECODEID) as ADMINISTRATIVECODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ADMINISTRATIVEEXPLANATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISDEPARTURE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISPROGRAMCOMPLETION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_LIVESWITHRELATIVES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAMILYMOVED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAMILYNOWPROVIDES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_PROJECTTOOFAR , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_REMOVEDBYPARENTS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_LACKOFINTEREST , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_NEEDEDATHOME , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_EMPLOYED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_TRANSFERRED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAILED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_DEATHOFCHILD , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_ILLNESS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_PREGNANCY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_MARRIED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_OTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DETAILEDEXPLANATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURENEWSITUATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.PROGRAMCOMPLETIONNEWSITUATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCHILDCHRISTIAN , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDCHRISTIANCOMMENTS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DIDBECOMECHRISTIAN , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SHOWSCHRISTIANKNOWLEDGE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.PARTICIPATESCHRISTIANACTIVITIES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SHOWSCHRISTIANEVIDENCE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.OWNSBIBLEMATERIALS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDCHRISTIANEXPERIENCE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HEALTHCONDITIONS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDMATURED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.LEVELOFMATURITY , (select dbo.USR_CHILDCLASSLEVEL_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDCLASSLEVEL_CODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HIGHESTCLASSLEVELCODEID) as HIGHESTCLASSLEVELCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HIGHESTCLASSLEVELOTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.COURSEOFSTUDY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BASICLITERACY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BASICNUMERACY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_THINKINGPROBLEMSOLVING , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_SELFHELP , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BUSINESS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_LIFE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_VOCATIONALTECHNICAL , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_OTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.GENERALCOMMENTS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURETYPE , dbo.INTERACTION.ID , dbo.INTERACTION.OBJECTIVE , (select [DESCRIPTION] from dbo.INTERACTIONTYPECODE where ID = dbo.INTERACTION.INTERACTIONTYPECODEID) as INTERACTIONTYPEDESCRIPTION , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALDATE , dbo.INTERACTION.[DATE] as INTERACTIONDATE , dbo.INTERACTION.COMMENT , (select [NAME] from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY where ID = dbo.INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID) as INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYDESCRIPTION , dbo.INTERACTION.STATUS , dbo.INTERACTION.SEQUENCEID , dbo.INTERACTION.LOOKUPID , SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID as OPPORTUNITYID , dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.FIELDMEMODATESENT , (select [DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONHOLDREASONCODE where ID = dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.HOLDREASONCODEID) as HOLDREASON , (select [DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONUNUSABLEITEMCODE where ID = dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.UNUSABLECODEID) as UNUSABLEITEM , (select [DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFIELDMEMOSENTCODE where ID = dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.FIELDMEMOSENTCODEID) as SENTCODE from dbo.INTERACTION join dbo.CONSTITUENT ON dbo.CONSTITUENT.ID = dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID = soc.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY ON dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID = soc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION ON dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION.ID = dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID left join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION ON dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.ID = dbo.INTERACTION.ID left join ( select u.ID, u.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, u.SIBLINGSID, u.BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID, u.CURRENTPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE, u.CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID, u.CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID, u.FATHERWORKSASCODEID, u.FATHERWORKSASOTHER, u.MOTHERWORKSASCODEID, u.MOTHERWORKSASOTHER, u.CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID, u.CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER, u.CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID, u.CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER, u.CAREGIVERREASONCODEID, u.REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER, u.NUMBEROFSISTERS, u.NUMBEROFBROTHERS, u.HOUSINGWALLWOOD, u.HOUSINGWALLMUD, u.HOUSINGWALLBAMBOO, u.HOUSINGWALLBLOCK, u.HOUSINGWALLOTHER, u.ROOFINGTIN, u.ROOFINGGRASSLEAVES, u.ROOFINGWOOD, u.ROOFINGTILE, u.ROOFINGOTHER, u.WATERSOURCEINDOOR, u.WATERSOURCECOMMUNITYTAP, u.WATERSOURCEBOREHOLEWELL, u.WATERSOURCERIVER, u.WATERSOURCEOTHER, u.COOKINGSOURCEWOODFIRE, u.COOKINGSOURCEELECTRICSTOVE, u.COOKINGSOURCEGASSTOVE, u.COOKINGSOURCEOTHER, u.LIGHTSOURCEELECTRICITY, u.LIGHTSOURCEOILLAMP, u.LIGHTSOURCEGENERATOR, u.LIGHTSOURCENONE, u.LIGHTSOURCEOTHER, u.AREADESCRIPTION, u.MYFAVORITETHINGTODO, u.WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE, u.WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY, u.WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM, u.SOMEDAYI, u.TWOMOSTFAVORITETHINGS, u.OTHERTHINGSTHECHILDENJOYS, u.CHILDPERSONALITY, u.CHILDHEALTH, u.SPIRITUALDEVELOPMENT, u.ATTENDINGSCHOOL, u.REASONNOTATTENDINGSCHOOL, u.CLASSLEVEL, u.FAVORITESUBJECT, u.VOCATIONALSKILLS, u.ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION, u.CCHENTEREDBY, u.CCHTEMPID, u.CURRENTPHOTODATE, u.PHOTOSTORED, u.CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID, u.CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID, u.PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION, u.FUNDED, u.BATCHNUMBER, u.REGISTRATIONDATE, u.ORIGINALPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE, u.ADDEDBYID, u.CHANGEDBYID, u.DATEADDED, u.DATECHANGED, u.TS, u.TSLONG, u.CCHVALIDATED, u.CHILDNICKNAME, u.DEPARTUREFORMRECEIVED, u.CCHZIPFILENAME, u.CURRENTCHILDSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID, u.TERMINATEHOLDSTARTDATE from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION u join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc2 ON u.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc2.ID ) uce on uce.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE ON dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc.ID and dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCURRENTDEPARTURECODE = 1
